column1: cirith is a noun meaning "pass" or "cleft" in Sindarin. Compare with the Quenya term cilya.
* Cirith Ninniach = "Pass of the Slender Crossing"
* The Languages of Tolkiens Middle-earth by Ruth S. Noel
* http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary compiled by Didier Willis
